senses.sense_definition: Something extremely large, powerful, and influential, such as an organization, machine, or building.

examples.text: The merger created a corporate <w>behemoth</w> that completely dominated the global market.
Engineers spent years designing the industrial <w>behemoth</w> to withstand extreme weather conditions.
It is difficult to change the direction of such a bureaucratic <w>behemoth</w> quickly.

senses.sense_definition: A huge and frightening monster or creature.

examples.text: The adventurers tried to sneak past the sleeping <w>behemoth</w> without waking it.
In the movie, a radioactive <w>behemoth</w> rises from the ocean to destroy the city.

senses.sense_definition: A legendary beast of immense size and power mentioned in the Bible.

examples.text: The ancient text describes the <w>behemoth</w> as a creature that eats grass like an ox.
Scholars have long debated the true identity of the biblical <w>behemoth</w>.
